description: A notification of a Level 3 event shall be defined as a work calendar.
title: Work calendar
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The work calendar definition defining this work calendar.
The work calendar entry(s) that are part of this work calendar.
This work calendar is defined in part by the work calendar definition property(s).

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.
